SoarScore

High-Speed-Low-Pass task and glider tracking for soaring competitions.

Developed by Anne Hoekstra.
Competion data from soaringspot.com. Glider Tracking provided by Glide and Seek using the OGN network.

Instructions for Pilots:
1 Use your FLARM in normal mode and do not set the "no-tracking" option.
2 Set your FLARM address to the ICAO address of your aircraft (prevents duplicated FLARM-IDs).
3 Add your your FLARM-ID and aircraft details to the OGN Devices Database.
